00048 //
00049 // FrequencyListCopier
00050 //
00051 // 24 August 2004 -- tds
00052 //
00053 // Finds IndexTerm nodes that only need to return frequency information,
00054 // not positions, and inserts IndexFrequencyTerms instead.
00055 //
00056 
00057 #ifndef INDRI_FREQUENCYLISTCOPIER_HPP
00058 #define INDRI_FREQUENCYLISTCOPIER_HPP
00059 
00060 #include "ListCache.hpp"
00061 
00062 class FrequencyListCopier : public indri::lang::Copier {
00063 private:
00064   std::vector<indri::lang::Node*> _nodes;
00065   std::stack<indri::lang::Node*> _disqualifiers;
00066   indri::lang::IndexTerm* _lastTerm;
00067   bool _disqualifiedTree;
00068 
00069   ListCache* _listCache;
00070 
00071 public:
00072   FrequencyListCopier( ListCache* listCache ) : _listCache(listCache), _lastTerm(0), _disqualifiedTree(false) {}
00073 
00074   indri::lang::Node* defaultAfter( indri::lang::Node* oldNode, indri::lang::Node* newNode ) {
00075     if( _disqualifiers.size() && oldNode == _disqualifiers.top() )
00076       _disqualifiers.pop();
00077     
00078     _nodes.push_back( newNode );
00079     return newNode;
00080   }
00081 
00082   void before( indri::lang::ExtentAnd* exAnd ) {
00083     _disqualifiers.push(exAnd);
00084   }
00085 
00086   void before( indri::lang::ExtentOr* exOr ) {
00087     _disqualifiedTree = true;
00088   }
00089 
00090   void before( indri::lang::ExtentInside* exInside ) {
00091     _disqualifiedTree = true;
00092   }
00093 
00094   void before( indri::lang::ExtentRestriction* exRestrict ) {
00095     _disqualifiers.push(exRestrict);
00096   }
00097 
00098   void before( indri::lang::ContextCounterNode* context ) {
00099     if( context->getContext() != NULL ) {
00100       _disqualifiedTree = true;
00101     }
00102   }
00103 
00104   void before( indri::lang::ODNode* odNode ) {
00105     _disqualifiedTree = true;
00106   }
00107 
00108   void before( indri::lang::UWNode* uwNode ) {
00109     _disqualifiedTree = true;
00110   }
00111 
00112   indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::IndexTerm* oldNode, indri::lang::IndexTerm* newNode ) {
00113     _lastTerm = newNode;
00114     return defaultAfter( oldNode, newNode );
00115   }
00116 
00117   void before( indri::lang::RawScorerNode* oldNode, indri::lang::RawScorerNode* newNode ) {
00118     _lastTerm = 0;
00119     _disqualifiedTree = false;
00120   }
00121 
00122   indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::RawScorerNode* oldNode, indri::lang::RawScorerNode* newNode ) {
00123     indri::lang::Node* result = 0;
00124 
00125     if( _lastTerm && !_disqualifiers.size() && !_disqualifiedTree && oldNode->getContext() == NULL ) {
00126       indri::lang::TermFrequencyScorerNode* scorerNode;
00127       // there's a term to score, and nothing to disqualify us from doing frequency scoring
00128       scorerNode = new indri::lang::TermFrequencyScorerNode( _lastTerm->getText(),
00129                                                              _lastTerm->getStemmed() );
00130 
00131       scorerNode->setNodeName( oldNode->nodeName() );
00132       scorerNode->setSmoothing( oldNode->getSmoothing() );
00133       scorerNode->setStatistics( oldNode->getOccurrences(), oldNode->getContextSize(),
00134                                  oldNode->getMaxOccurrences(), oldNode->getMinContextLength(),
00135                                  oldNode->getMaxContextLength(),
00136                                  oldNode->getMaxContextFraction() );
00137 
00138       delete newNode;
00139       result = defaultAfter( oldNode, scorerNode );
00140     } else if( !_disqualifiers.size() ) {
00141       ListCache::CachedList* list = 0; 
00142 
00143       if( _listCache )
00144         list = _listCache->find( newNode->getRawExtent(), newNode->getContext() );
00145       
00146       if( list ) {
00147         indri::lang::CachedFrequencyScorerNode* cachedNode;
00148         cachedNode = new indri::lang::CachedFrequencyScorerNode( newNode->getRawExtent(), newNode->getContext() );
00149         cachedNode->setNodeName( newNode->nodeName() );
00150         cachedNode->setSmoothing( newNode->getSmoothing() );
00151         cachedNode->setList( list );
00152 
00153         delete newNode;
00154         result = defaultAfter( oldNode, cachedNode );
00155       } else {
00156         result = defaultAfter( oldNode, newNode );
00157       }
00158     } else {
00159       result = defaultAfter( oldNode, newNode );
00160     }
00161 
00162     _disqualifiedTree = false;
00163     return result; 
00164   }
00165 };
00166 
00167 #endif // INDRI_FREQUENCYLISTCOPIER_HPP
00168
